title: In Backup & reset, why can't I select the backup or the reset functions?
answer:
You need to add a Google account to your phone to use these functions. Go to Settings > Accounts and touch Add account. On the Add account screen, choose Google to set up a Google account. 

 If you want to back up data to your phone's local storage, press the home button. Go to the Tools folder and open the Backup app.
